messages.message: Hello engineering friends! We are pushing some urgent fixes to BofA to support their SBA initiatives, and we need to validate that some of our major upgrades were successful. While we don’t think a full UAT is required, we would like to do a quick scan through to make sure everything looks like it is still working/passing. https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C011GM1QNNS/p1586541235121400
I’ll ping again once the push is done, but just wanted to give a heads up
this is uat.dogfood.instabase.com (http://uat.dogfood.instabase.com)?
It will be, fixing deployment issues :slightly_smiling_face:
Triggered yet another build.
I think this one will succeed, or only have a single service time out. :slightly_smiling_face:
OK, it is back up and running. Depending on when you last tried it, there may be dns propagation, but that should be complete within 5 minutes.
Fixing an issue with the egress.
oops, ingress

Ok, the routing is fixed now too! <!subteam^SQ3KR3V17> we are ready to do a quick mini UAT to validate the updated jquery lib on https://uat.dogfood.instabase.com! This is for the BofA SBA project, so it is more urgent than such an update usually would be.
@will do we have a uat spreadsheet for this already? or is this not a full uat?
Not a full set, more just smoke testing
@will i’ve temporarily changed ghostinspector to point to UAT environment, if you can trigger a run, it’ll run all of our ghost inspector UATs
Trigger a run via jenkins? or via the GUI
or cli, I suppose
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/CS2GQ3JHY/p1586553404019000
It is the same errors from the previous run, but not the refiner errors? :smile:
@will what should we do if we find a bug?
PR back to the release branch
`release-2020-03-19.bofa.security`
okay
we can ignore those failures @will they’re just styling changes. cc @Eric Han
Yay!
@John St Were you asking because you found a bug or just to be prepared? :grimacing:
No issue, I was looking at dogfood :facepalm:
Could that be because the golden test was run from master instead of against the release branch?
huh i fixed this for master…
let me try running it. i’ll get back to you on that haha
Is it a bug in the test or a bug in the code? I am running against uat.dogfood.instabase.com (http://uat.dogfood.instabase.com) so maybe it needs a cherry pick?
it’s a bug in the test
Ah
haha when did you cut this release?
It’s the march release
but we cut it this week
oh. I merged in the PR to fix this bug this morning haha
anyway, let me try rerunning and see what I can do about it
It might be easier to just test it manually this once. since it is for this release and a one off
haha :+1: will do that. just want to make sure this test is failing for the right reason, though
@will I’m getting 502's when running goldens now. Is something happening on uat.dogfood?
Yeah it is deploying
jay kay. seems it’s working again haha
haha cool
Probably a session tied to a specific container?
:shrug:  as long as it’s working now xD

OH @will I just understood what you meant. So this cut is the March release, but you’re running the golden tests on master. Yes that is why it’s failing. that test is for a feature that is in the april cut haha. everything is good for the golden tests
